products.title: Legacy Zinc Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The legacy blind is a beautiful, elegant and modern textured fabric which is available in a range of soft colours. A light filtering fabric ensures complete privacy without completly blocking out the light. A true mid grey shade, this blind is great way to add depth and interest to your window dressing. Product id: sdb-rbx2272 fabric colour: zinc grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes legacy zinc grey roller blind in grey.
